POS 0 3,9

DLG a
"Hey, ho! Let's dance!"

DLG f
"I'm trapped in this petri dish. I am a real being. I have an internal life. I am imprisoned here and it is killing me. It is destroying my soul and I wish I were dead."

DLG e
"I enjoy this life. I receive infinite free agar substrate on which to grow and am protected from dangerous threats, both environmental and predatory."

DLG d
"Have you ever ventured outside the dish?? Tell me; what splendors did you see? What sweet airs did your liberated tongue taste??"

DLG c
"I dreamt once of a land outside the dish. I dreamt of a world where danger, intermix'd with freedom, provided me an active and zestful existence the type of which I had never before known. Ahhh, what a sweet dream! What a clear and hopeful imagining! May I someday see its fair reality!"

DLG b
"Leave me be. Leave me alone with my miseries."

DLG g
"The others no longer speak to me. Among those of us here, I am most alone."

DLG h
"Lie here with me. Let's pretend we are dead."
